title: InmoLux
description: The client interface was built using JavaScript and React for an intuitive experience. It integrates Leaflet for interactive maps and Cloudinary for image management. The backend is built with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, ensuring efficient communication between server and client. Web application developed in collaboration with Gemma Fernandez.

title: ClickArte
description: It uses React to build the user interface and Bootstrap for responsive layouts. The backend is built with Node.js. The application implements CRUD operations for image management and uses the React Context API for efficient state management between components. This project was developed by me in partnership with Samuel Angulo.
